notes_display: In Historical Sketches of the Paper Currency of the American Colonies by Henry Phillips, Jr. (1865). Given to Dr. Jesse C. Green in 1890. Leaf 56BC. Plate B.
issue_place_s: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States of America
issue_obverse_legend_s: SIX PENCE. This Bill shall pass current for SIX PENCE, according to an Act of General Assembly of the Common-Wealth of Pennsylvania, passed the Twentieth Day of March, in the Year One Thousand Seven Hundred and Seventy-seven. Dated the tenth Day of April, A.D. 1777. Six Pence.
issue_reverse_legend_s: To Counterfeit is DEATH. | SIX PENCE. Philadelphia: Printed by JOHN DUNLAP. 1777. SIX PENCE.
